title: "Objective Is To Defend American People": Trump As US, Israel Attack Iran
summary_full: US President Donald Trump said that the US has begun "major combat operations in Iran" after Israel launched strikes and said that the objective of the attack is to "defend American people".
summary_public: US President Donald Trump said that the US has begun "major combat operations in Iran" after Israel launched strikes and said that the objective of the attack is to "defend American people".
